item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:17:01 UTC – Details)



Sturdy strawberries: 2 pack 33 feet 50 led fairy lights with 7.8 inch lights spacing, sufficient length for long distance lighting, just plug in and light up your daily life; impact resistant, shatterproof and break resistant led bulbs can withstand careless dropping; not cracking even stepping on it; a great gift for families, friends or relatives
50 sets connectable: Easy to install with a cable tie or cup hook, fix it or place it anywhere necessary; up to 50 strands connectable to maximize your need for larger area lighting and festival decorations, 3.9 inches end cord with key designed female connector for quick access and easy connection
Replacement lights and fuse: 2 spare led bulbs and 2 spare fuses for replacement included, take off the led shade, pull out the damaged led bulb from bulb seat, plug in a new one with proper force and put back the shade; slide out the fuse chamber cover toward two blades and take out the burnt out one, install the new one correctly and close the cover; plug in and try working
Unexpected occasions: It is fabulous for Christmas, home, roof, garden, patio, balcony, porch, hallway, fence, shelf, bistro, pub, cafe, restaurant, shopping center, supermarket, New Year, birthday, gathering, disco ball party, dinner party, evening party, note:The AC plug is not waterproof, it should be protected from rainy day
Notes and reminders: 1. Before replacing bulbs, unplug the lights from AC outlet or switch off the Christmas lights string 2. Keep it away from children, kids or toddlers and store them out of their reach 3. Replace with same type bulb

4.5
Price: $39.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:17:01 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $199.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:23:59 UTC – Details)

From the brand

It’s not just a device stand… it’s freedom to move about your abode. That freedom can be compromised if your device stand wobbles. or can’t extend over your furniture. LEVO’s aluminum tubing and brawny joints create a structure that is sturdy to minimize wobbling. All developed by our team, these components are used throughout our LEVO line. All this greatness is backed by over 22 years of supreme manufacturer care. LEVO – Elevate your lifestyle!

LEVO for Your Tablet

Laptop Workstations

LEVO for Hospitals B07X2PXM4T

Brings the world to patientsUL Listed for use in hospitalsIncludes USB-C charging port.

ROBUST CONSTRUCTION FOR RESIDENTIAL OR COMMERCIAL USE. Sit, recline, or lie in bed and LEVO will securely hold your tablet at the perfect height and viewing angle. Flip lever height locks and 5 axis articulating swing arm for quick positioning. Simply grab the platform then swing tilt and spin it into perfect view. No clearance needed under your furniture. Includes 2 inch wheels for smooth rolling. Patented.
SUPER STURDY CONSTRUCTION minimizes annoying bouncing while surfing or typing, and protects your valuable device from tipping over. Swing-arm quickly swings and folds when not in use, or to exit your furniture. Quickly swings back in place at the exact same height and angle so you can continue surfing in deluxe style anytime.
EXTENDS 24 INCHES to the center of your device. Quickly spins from portrait to landscape so you can view your pages or photos at their best. Height adjusts from 30-56 inches (nice range) measured from floor to center of device.
INTERCHANGEABLE PLATFORMS so you can quickly switch from electronic devices to books and magazines (book platform sold separately – search B00GIJ20O6). Compatible with all iPads including 12.9 iPad Pro, Galaxy tablets, Surface, Zoom, Nexus, Nook, Fire, and other tablets and eReaders with length from 5.25 to 13.5 inches (including case), and weighing up to 4 pounds. Attach and remove your device in seconds.
LUSTROUS ANODIZED ALUMINUM finish looks fabulous in your home or office. Gunmetal color with black accents. 3-year warranty.




BOOK PLATFORM KIT
LEVO Utility Basket
Optional Accessories Platforms on this LEVO are quickly interchangeable. With our optional Book Platform Kit, you can swith from reading your tablet to reading books, magazines, cookbooks, sheet music and more. Add stowage space to your LEVO Floor Stand. Stow your stuff such as tablets, batteries, eye glasses, notebooks, headphones, medical equipment, books, or just about anything else! Except liquids… of course.








THE LEVO ON THIS PAGE
LEVO Rolling Laptop Workstation
LEVO G2 Essential Tablet Stand
LEVO G2 Table Clamp Tablet Stand
LEVO G2 Rolling Book Holder
LEVO Extend Your Phone
Best for (devices) Tablets Laptops Tablets Tablets Books, Magazines Phones
Basic Description Our most robust rolling tablet stand. Can also hold books with our optional Book Platform Kit. Our most robust rolling laptop stand. Can also hold books with our optional Book Kit. Our lightweight tablet stand. You can easily carry throughout your home or office. Can also hold books with our optional Book Platform Kit. Our tablet stand that connects to your side table, desk, kitchen counter, cart, or other surface. Very handy for travel too. Can also hold books with our optional Book Platform Kit. Our most robust rolling book stand. Can also hold tablets with our optional Dual Clamp. Our very handy phone holder. It holds your phone at eye level while you sit in any chair. Even at the beach! Great for bed too.
Max Height – from Floor to Center of Device. 40 inches (101 cm) Measured fhes (109 cm) Measured fromrom your floor to the center of your keyboard. 40 inches (101 cm) Measured from your floor to the center of your keyboard. 43 inches (109 cm) Measured from your floor to the center of your device. 16.5 inches (42 cm) Measured from your tabletop to the center of your device. 56 inches (142 cm) Our Highest! Measured from your floor to the center of your Book. Height adjusts from 13” to 32” for wide range of uses such as watching videos, filming videos, reading the news, working on your email, taking picture, and more

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Price: $147.13
(as of Nov 28,2022 23:05:28 UTC – Details)


Amazon Basics 46,000 BTU Outdoor Propane Patio Heater with Wheels, Commercial & Residential – Slate Gray Minimum heater clearances from combustible materials can can be found in the user manual found on this page
Powerful 46,000 BTU outdoor gas heater provides heat up to a 9 foot radius; ideal for commercial cafes and restaurants or home patios
Constructed with aluminum, plastic, and steel with a durable powder-coated finish
One-touch ignition button for easy start up; requires 20lb liquid propane gas tank (not included); chain included to secure tank
Features adjustable temperature knob, tilt safety auto-shut off valve, water box for weighting the base and wheel kit
Secure the patio heater when not in use to avoid any potential damage to unit
Dimensions: 32.12 x 32.12 x 91.3 inches (LxWxH); weight: 38 pounds

Amazon Basics Outdoor 46,000 BTU Propane Patio Heaters

Powerful 46,000 BTUs of Heat

The patio heaters deliver 46,000 BTUs of quiet, consistent heat- up to a 9 foot radius. It is powered by liquid propane gas (LPG tank not included).

Easy Start and Adjustable Heat

The Piezo ignition system allows for one-touch, push-button start-ups. Use the control knob to choose low or high heat or to turn the heater off.

Safety Shut-Off

For enhanced safety, the patio heater features a shut-off tilt valve that turns the heater off automatically if it tips over.

Durable, Mobile Design

The heavy duty patio heaters include two wheels for smooth mobility. The waterbox can be filled with water for weighted stability.

4.5
Price: $147.13
(as of Nov 28,2022 23:05:28 UTC – Details)
